entities.name: cornelius
entities.description: Cornelius is the one to whom Harry says he will not come quietly. He is mentioned as being present in the room.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison that Cornelius wants to send Harry to. It is mentioned as a place where Harry does not want to go.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who has been stunned by Fudge's expression. He is mentioned as being present in the room.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister of Magic who looks at Dumbledore with a silly expression, as though he had just been stunned by a sudden blow.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is one of the people present in the room. He is mentioned along with Fudge looking at Dumbledore.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge's face is growing steadily redder as she looks at Harry. She is mentioned as being filled with boiling water.

relationships.description: Cornelius wants to send Harry to Azkaban, which means that Cornelius is the one who will decide where Harry goes.
Fudge looks at Dumbledore with a silly expression, as though he had just been stunned by a sudden blow. This means that Fudge's reaction is directed towards Dumbledore.
